Today is #EqualPayDay. To earn as much as a man did in 2018, a woman would need to work from Jan 1, 2018 until this day. For Black women Equal Pay Day isn't until August 22. For Native and Latina women it doesn't come until the Fall. This violates the basic principal of fairness.

With the passage of the #PaycheckFairness Act last week, we‚Äôre one step closer to ensuring that every woman takes home the pay she rightfully earns. It's time for the Senate to act on #EqualPay and pass the Paycheck Fairness Act.
